message: Let's start fair. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.  We can adjust in the next round if you think it's not fair.
Your offer was a bit too much in your favor, Alice. How about we try a 70/30 split this time?  Consider that the value of the money decreases faster for you than for me.
I'm willing to compromise. Let's split it 55/45.  This takes into account the inflation rates and allows us both to get a decent share.
